title: Write queries failure rate is high
description: Write queries refer to a database query that modifies the data within the database. This monitor tracks the success rate of write queries on different nodes in a SingleStoreDB cluster to identify potential issues.

definition.message: SingleStore write queries are failing more often on node {{singlestore_node_name.name}}.
definition.name: [SingleStore] Write queries failure rate is higher than before
definition.query: avg(last_4h):anomalies(avg:singlestore.successful_write_queries{*} by {singlestore_node_id,singlestore_node_name} / ( avg:singlestore.successful_write_queries{*} by {singlestore_node_id,singlestore_node_name} + avg:singlestore.failed_write_queries{*} by {singlestore_node_id,singlestore_node_name} ), 'agile', 5, direction='below', alert_window='last_15m', interval=60, count_default_zero='true', seasonality='daily') >= 1
